revision.comment: Robertiki moved page [[Talk:Mike Jackson]] to [[Talk:Mike Jackson (British Army officer)]]: More people having the same exact name

== Reads stupidly ==
The Troubles
Yugoslav Wars
Kosovo War
The troubles? A band? A fight outside the pub? A weather event?
:See [[The Troubles]]: it's the common name for the conflict in Northern Ireland. [[User:Nick-D|Nick-D]] ([[User talk:Nick-D|talk]]) 02:22, 6 July 2014 (UTC)
== Jackson's mother ==
"Jackson's mother, Ivy (née Bower[6]), was from Yorkshire and won a scholarship to [[Sheffield Grammar School]]." Firstly, Sheffield Grammar School was boys only, and secondly it closed in 1905. The [[Sheffield High School (South Yorkshire)|Sheffield High School]] is much more likely. [[User:Occuli|Occuli]] ([[User talk:Occuli|talk]]) 20:37, 31 July 2011 (UTC) :I've removed the bit about her schooling. I'm pretty sure that's what the sources say, but evidently they're wrong. [[User:HJ Mitchell|<font color="Teal" face="Tahoma">'''HJ Mitchell'''</font>]] | [[User talk:HJ Mitchell|<font color="Navy" face= "Times New Roman">Penny for your thoughts? </font>]] 00:37, 30 August 2011 (UTC)
== DoB == Is his Date of Birth correct? IIRC you had to be over 18 to enter RMA Sandhurst, DoB Mar 44 and entry to RMA in Jan 62 does not seem right, the Jan 62 entry is definitely correct. :Who's Who 2010 confirms a date of birth of 21 March 1944.[[User:Dormskirk|Dormskirk]] ([[User talk:Dormskirk|talk]]) 09:14, 6 July 2014 (UTC)
==Sheffield== Sheffield is in South Yorkshire, it is not in West Yorkshire. Someone keeps changing it. Why? Actually following the link to Sheffield shows you that it's in South Yorkshire. Can someone change this? <small class="autosigned">— Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/82.2.100.183|82.2.100.183]] ([[User talk:82.2.100.183|talk]]) 18:42, 23 January 2015 (UTC)</small><!-- Template:Unsigned IP --> <!--Autosigned by SineBot--> :This is about where he was born. South Yorkshire didn't exist in 1944—Sheffield was part of the West Riding at that time. As is also mentioned in the ''second sentence'' of the article about Sheffield. [[User:HJ Mitchell|<font color="Teal" face="Tahoma">'''HJ Mitchell'''</font>]] | [[User talk:HJ Mitchell|<font color="Navy" face= "Times New Roman">Penny for your thoughts? </font>]] 19:00, 23 January 2015 (UTC)
